body.name: Vizio 24IN D-Series LED Smart TV 23.54IN DIAG D24H-E1
features: Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 22.03" x 13.21" x 2.36", TV with stand: 22.03" x 14.98" x 6.26"
Smart functionality offers access to a wide variety of popular apps with streaming content and internet radio
720p HD produces an incredible level of radiance and crystal-clear detail
Distributes LEDs along the edge of the screen for a brilliant picture in an all-new modern design. 60Hz Refresh Rate allows fast moving action scenes to be seen with virtually no motion blur
Inputs: HDMI Ports x 1, Component x 1, Ethernet x 1, USB Ports x 1, TV Tuner
body.description: VIZIO D-Series Smart HDTV delivers vivid picture quality and an easy to use Smart TV experience at an incredible value. VIZIO Internet Apps Plus gives you easy access to popular apps. Key Specs: VideoClass Size: 24.00"Screen Size (Diag.): 23.54"Display Processor: V6 Six Core ProcessorBacklight Type: Edge Lit LEDResolution: HD 1366 x 768Effective Refresh Rate: 60Hz Aspect Ratio: 16:9Dynamic Contrast Ratio: 200K:1Number of Colors: 16.7 MillionOSD Language: English, Spanish, French Audio: DTS StudioSound: YesDTS TruSurround: YesDTS TruVolume: Yes Smart TVVIA (VIZIO Internet Apps): YesBuilt in Wi Fi: 802.11n InputsHDMI Ports: 1 (rear)Component: 1 (rear)Ethernet: 1 (rear)USB Ports: 1 (rear)TV Tuner: Yes OutputsARC: YesEnergy SavingsEnergy Compliance: ENERGY STAR 7.0Power Consumption: <20.8WStandby Power Consumption: <0.5W Wall Mount SpecificationsMount Pattern: 100mm x 100mmScrew Size: M4Hole Depth: 8.0mm Stand AssemblyScrew Size: Q4Screw Length: 10mm Included AccessoriesRemote Control: XRT122 Size and WeightProduct with Stand Dimensions: 22.03"W x 14.98"H x 6.26"DProduct with Stand Weight: 7.45 lbs.Product without Stand Dimensions: 22.03"W x 13.21"H x 2.36"DProduct without Stand Weight: 7.28 lbs.Product Packaging Dimensions: 24.80"W x 4.53"H x 16.46"DProduct Packaging Weight: 10.58 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smll TV for Bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Although small by today's screen size standards, this is 24" smart TV has everything we need for our bedroom, including convenient size. The smart features are easy to setup and the picture quality is excellent. We are quite pleased with our purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small TV to exceed expectations.
reviews.reviewText: Only knock is that the remote is a little lower quality than some of my other Vizio remotes for higher end TVs, but that's to be expected at this price point. Great smart TV for the price. Picture and sound are pleasing and exceed expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tiny text on screen.
reviews.reviewText: Picture quality and color is very good. However, the font size is so small that you have to physically get closer to see it. This is a 24" TV. You literally can NOT see the channel selection across the top of the screen from a distance of more than 3 feet. This photo is zoomed in. I have 20/20 vision with my glasses and cannot read the channel selection. This is the same case with other menu selection items on different screens. REMOTE: One star down because it does not have a "Sleep" option on the remote. You have to navigate to Settings, Sleep, Time, Back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clear picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars HDMI is confusing and the TV has a hard time receiving cable,.
reviews.reviewText: I purchase that TV 7 months ago, I thought it was a descent model but I have never seen anything like it. The images are very clear but I can only use the Apps through Wi-Fi and the TV lost signal and take too much times to reboot and I tried to cable Verizon Fios services they fix it but after a couple of days it stopped receiving cable services. If I knew I would probably read the reviews carefully before I made that choice. So far I am spending more money on cable services and the TV is somewhat useless because it was a gift and my aunt does not care too much for smart tv and I thought that was not going to be a problem but I was wrong. That TV is smart for it's own good. I thing the product is defected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Turned Out to Be a Lemon
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this in mid-June 2020. It is now late August 2020 & the TV has stopped working. It simply will not turn on. I changed the batteries in the remote as well as unplugged & then plugged it back in a few times. It has done this before several times & after unplugging it for a few seconds, it came back on. But today that has not worked; it is dead. The other day I turned it on & there was no picture, although I had audio. I turned it off & then on & the picture came back. So it has been misbehaving on & off all summer--very disappointing for a brand new TV. It is too late to return it to Amazon so I am hoping that the seller will do the right thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have had for about 2 months, use every day without any problems.
reviews.reviewText: Does all I want and easy for a tech challenged elderly woman to set up. Great color with prompts easy to follow for adjustments.

Had it for almost a month now, works great, picture looks good, and the smart aspect of the tv feels very quick and responsive. Only 2 complaints...1. Vizio, for whatever reason, decided to downgrade the resolution from last year's model (1080p down to 780p). I have no idea why they did this, but I think that's what's driving the high cost of last year's model (currently ~$290 for the 2016 and only $200 for the 2017). 2. Unless you plan on getting exactly a 100x100 vesa mount wall bracket, you will find that the I/O's in the back are rather poorly placed. I bought a 23-55" wall mounting bracket with this tv and I ended up having to take a grinder to it to expose the power and Hdmi jacks. If the ports were facing down, instead of straight out the back, I doubt this would have been an issue.

Fine picture but reflective surface. May have chosen a matt screen for my case.Poor sound but this was mentioned.WiFi enabled but no Casting built in.Knowing now, would have opted for the lower cost version without wifi.Remote function is very critical of line of sight and may require multiple clicks.Good tv, but would not be a "recommended" pick.
Un cadeau qui a été très apprécié, il fonctionne a merveille!!!
Excellent customer service from Vizio, had 1 issue the remote stopped working and it was replaced almost immediately. Would buy from them again if need be.
Hade this for a while now and works great and my daughter loves it
